checks: Confirm freezer temperature is near zero fahrenheit
Check water supply line for kinks or frozen sections
Inspect inlet valve for debris and operation
Check ice maker arm position and cycling
safety: Disconnect power before any part replacement
Shut off water supply before working on water lines

details: Most orders are delivered within 3-7 business days.
Express shipping options are available at checkout.
Delivery times may vary depending on location and product availability.
Items can be returned within 30 days of delivery.
Products must be unused and in original packaging.
Refunds are issued to the original payment method after inspection.
Exchanges are available for items of equal or lesser value.
If the replacement item is more expensive, the price difference will be charged.
Contact customer support to initiate an exchange request.
We provide repair services for appliances under warranty.
Out-of-warranty repairs can be scheduled for a service fee.
Contact support to book a repair appointment with a certified technician.
Customer support is available via email at support@example.com.
You can reach us by phone at (123) 456-7890 between 9 AM - 6 PM EST.
Live chat support is available on our website during business hours.
